title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.

title: Happy Independnce Day
synopsis: Classic twitter. Well-known ironic left-leaning journalist ad commenaator who made his name analyzing some of the oddness of extreme right culture posts this image, gets hudreds of angry responses and calls to his boss for discipline.
